description: Finally the work in "Yummy green" studio has come to an end...
body:
There are but little changes compared to the original project, and the design is a complete success. The owners’ worst fear was that such amount of furniture in a small space will make it look cramped and scanty. The result was beyond anybody’s expectations: a functional and well organized space that is roomy, comfortable and playful.
